import React, { useState } from 'react' const axios = require("axios") export const Register = (props) => { const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') function Submit(){ axios .post('localhost:8080/register', { username: username, email: email, password: password }) .then(function (result) { if (result.data.token) { localStorage.setItem('token', result.data.token) window.location = '/' } }) } return ( <>
username
{ setUsername(e.target.value) }} />
email
{ setEmail(e.target.value) }} />
password
{ setPassword(e.target.value) }} />

) }
